title: I Need Secrets (or Environment Variables) in my Build

sections.title: I Need Secrets (or Environment Variables) in my Build
I Need Secrets (or Environment Variables) in my Build
sections.content: It may happen that your documentation depends on an authenticated service to be built properly.

sections.title: Adding a new scenario to the repository
